info.title: Sales Order
info.description:
An agreement between a vendor and a customer concerning the
sale and delivery of goods and services, as well as any
services that are associated with these processes, on a
specific date, for a specific quantity, and for a specific
price.

x-sap-shortText:
An agreement between a vendor and a customer concerning the
sale and delivery of goods and services, as well as any
services that are associated with these processes, on a
specific date, for a specific quantity, and for a specific
price.

tags.name: SalesOrder
tags.description:
An agreement between a vendor and a customer concerning the
sale and delivery of goods and services, as well as any
services that are associated with these processes, on a
specific date, for a specific quantity, and for a specific
price.

sap.graph.SalesOrder.title: SalesOrder

createdAt.description: Date and time the entity was created.

changedAt.description: Date and time the entity was changed last.

displayId.description: A unique identifier that represents a product.

orderType.description: A code that represents the type of sales order.

orderReason.description: Indicates the reason for creating the sales order.

_orderReason.description: Indicates the reason for creating the sales order.

soldToParty.description:
The customer who orders the goods or services. The sold-to
party is contractually responsible for sales orders.

_soldToParty.description:
The customer who orders the goods or services. The sold-to
party is contractually responsible for sales orders.

soldToPartyPurchaseOrderId.description:
Number that the customer uses to uniquely identify a
purchasing document.

requestedDeliveryDate.description:
The date and time the delivery of goods or the services are
requested by the customer.

salesOffice.description:
A physical location that has responsibility for the sale of
certain products or services within a given geographical
area.

salesGroup.description:
A group of sales people who are responsible for processing
sales of certain products or services.

documentCurrency.description: Currency that applies to the sales order.

_documentCurrency.description: Currency that applies to the sales order.

netAmount.description: Net Value of the Sales Order in Net Amount Currency.

pricingDate.description: Date for Pricing and Exchange Rate.

incotermsClassification.description:
Commonly used trading terms that comply with the standards
established by the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC).

_incotermsClassification.description:
Commonly used trading terms that comply with the standards
established by the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC).

incotermsLocation.description: Additional information for the primary Incoterm.

approvalStatus.description:
States whether a sales document is relevant for approvals
and, if so, which approval stage it is in.

processingStatus.description: The processing status of the entire sales document.

cancellationStatus.description: Displays the rejection status of the entire sales document.

deliveryBlockingReason.description: Indicates if the entire sales order is blocked for delivery.

billingBlockingReason.description: Indicates if the entire sales order is blocked for billing.

sap.graph.SalesOrder.description:
An agreement between a vendor and a customer concerning the
sale and delivery of goods and services, as well as any
services that are associated with these processes, on a
specific date, for a specific quantity, and for a specific
price.

parentItemId.description:
The number of the higher-level item to which this item
belongs in a hierarchy.

itemText.description: Short description of the sales order item.

soldToPartyPurchaseOrderItemId.description:
Number that the customer uses to uniquely identify a
purchasing document (e.g. an inquiry or a purchase order).

quantityUnit.description: Unit of measure of the item quantity.

productionPlant.description: Key that uniquely identifies a plant.

netAmount.description: Net Value of the Order Item in Net Amount Currency.

taxAmount.description: Tax Value of the Order Item in Tax Amount Currency.

processingStatus.description: The processing status of the entire sales document.

billingStatus.description:
The order-related billing status shows to what extent an
item has been processed for billing.

cancellationReason.description: Reason for Rejection of Sales Documents.

partyRole.description:
Role of the partner in a sales order. Roles are for example:
Ship To, Sold To, but also Contact.

partyId.description: ID of a Supplier, Customer, Personnel or ContactPerson.

region.description: The region where the address is located.

city.description: The city where the address is located.

district.description: The district where the address is located.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

street.description: The street address for the address.

streetPrefix.description:
An additional address field that is printed before the
street line.

additionalStreetPrefix.description:
An additional address field that is printed before the
street line.

streetSuffix.description:
An additional address field that is printed after the street
line.

line.

The postal code or zip code where the post office box is
located.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Bank HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
